question: Which company set up a steel plant at Manoharpur in West Singhbhum district along with Jharkhand Mineral Development Corporation (JSMDC)?
explanation: The Vedanta group and Jharkhand Mineral Development Corporation (JSMDC) set up a steel plant at Manoharpur in West Singhbhum district. The total Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) of Rs 700 crore has been signed and project proposals worth Rs 15 to 16,000 crore will be effective in July.
